function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Underfunding of vector control R&D and programmes","Impact":"Increased risk of ineffective vector control and spread of vector-borne diseases","Mitigation":"Increase investment in vector control R&D and programmes, prioritize funding for surveillance systems and skilled personnel","Technologies":"Advanced surveillance systems, monitoring and evaluation tools, investment in vector control R&D","People":"Population at risk of vector-borne diseases, public health officials, policymakers","Owner":"Government, public health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Inadequate funding for NTDs","Impact":"Limited capacity to control neglected tropical diseases, increased risk of transmission and spread","Mitigation":"Increase Official Development Assistance for NTDs, prioritize funding for NTD control and elimination programs","Technologies":"Advanced diagnostics, surveillance systems, investment in NTD research and development","People":"Population at risk of neglected tropical diseases, public health officials, policymakers","Owner":"Government, public health organizations, international aid organizations"},{"Description":"Global financing shortfalls for malaria control and elimination","Impact":"Inadequate resources to achieve malaria control and elimination targets, increased risk of malaria resurgence and transmission","Mitigation":"Increase global financing for malaria control and elimination, allocate resources to support malaria elimination targets and programs","Technologies":"Advanced malaria surveillance systems, investment in malaria research and development, mobile health technologies for malaria control","People":"Population at risk of malaria, public health officials, policymakers","Owner":"Global health organizations, government, international aid organizations"}]}
